signInSubheading: Welcome back! Please enter your details
doNotHaveAccountYet: Do not have an account yet?
signUpToAcceptInvite: Please sign in/up to accept the invite
clickToAcceptAs: Click the button below to accept the invite with as {{email}}
acceptInviteWithDifferentAccount: Want to accept the invite with a different account?
alreadyHaveAccountStatement: I already have an account, I want to sign in instead
doNotHaveAccountStatement: I do not have an account, I want to sign up instead
passwordResetSubheading: Enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
passwordResetSuccessMessage: We sent you a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
passwordLengthError: Please provide a password with at least 6 characters
sendLinkSuccessDescription: We sent you a sign-in link. Please check your email.
sendLinkSuccess: We sent you a link by email
verificationCodeHint: Enter the code we sent you by SMS
sendMfaCodeError: Sorry, we couldn't send you a verification code
verifyMfaCodeError: Ops! It looks like the code is not correct
reauthenticateDescription: For security reasons, we need you to re-authenticate
errorAlertHeading: Sorry, we could not authenticate you
emailConfirmationAlertHeading: We sent you a confirmation email.
emailConfirmationAlertBody: Please check your email and click the link to verify your account.
resendLinkSuccessDescription: We sent you a new link to your email. Follow the link to sign in.
authenticationErrorAlertBody: Sorry, we could not authenticate you. Please try again.
resetPasswordError: Sorry, we could not reset your password. Please try again.
inviteAlertHeading: You have been invited to join a team
inviteAlertBody: Please sign in or sign up to accept the invite and join the team.
existingAccountHint: You previously signed in with <method>{{method}}</method>. <signInLink>Already have an account?</signInLink>
linkAccountToSignInDescription: Add one or more sign-in methods to your account
noIdentityLinkedDescription: You haven't added any authentication methods yet. Are you sure you want to continue? You can set up sign-in methods later in your personal account settings.

errors.User already registered: This credential is already in use. Please try with another one.
errors.Email not confirmed: Please confirm your email address before signing in
errors.default: We have encountered an error. Please ensure you have a working internet connection and try again
errors.generic: Sorry, we weren't able to authenticate you. Please try again.
errors.linkDescription: Sorry, we weren't able to sign you in. Please try again.
errors.codeVerifierMismatch: It looks like you're trying to sign in using a different browser than the one you used to request the sign in link. Please try again using the same browser.
errors.minPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.minPasswordNumbers: Password must contain at least one number
errors.minPasswordSpecialChars: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.Signups not allowed for otp: OTP is disabled. Please enable it in your account settings.
errors.uppercasePassword: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.insufficient_aal: Please sign-in with your current multi-factor authentication to perform this action
errors.otp_expired: The email link has expired. Please try again.
errors.same_password: The password cannot be the same as the current password
